subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Vendee Globe Challenge
Alternative and Renewable Energy
lead_paragraph: It took three years of intense trial and error, but Javier Sanso’s entry in the Vendée Globe, the Acciona 100% EcoPowered, has been fully charged since the start in November.
snippet: It took three years of intense trial and error, but Javier Sanso’s entry in the Vendée Globe, the Acciona 100% EcoPowered, has been fully charged since the start in November.
